segments.text: This looks like a nice restaurant .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , it is . I come here all the time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can you pass me a menu please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . What are you going to have to drink ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm going to have a glass of beer . How about you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think I'll have a glass of wine .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you want to order an appetizer first ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not really , maybe we can just order some bread .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . What are you going to have to eat ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm not sure . I haven't decided yet . Can you recommend something ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure , I've had the steak and the lobster before . They're both very good .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think I'll have the lobster . What are you going to have ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm not that hungry . I think I'm just going to have a salad .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm gonna go to the bathroom . When the waitress comes back , will you order for me ?
segments.speaker: S2
